properties.verseOrder: c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Malaika wa Bwana (Mungu),
uchukue sadaka;
Upeleke mbele ya uso, wa Mungu.
(Malaika). *2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 1. Ni mazao ya nchi yetu, Na kazi yao wanadamu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 2. Mkate mazao ya shamba, divai tunda la mzabibu.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 3. Ufikishe sadaka hii, karibu na kiti cha enzi.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: 4. Sadaka yetu ifanyike, mbele ya uso wa muumba.
